text: Peter William Mayhew (May 19, 1944 - April 30, 2019) was an English actor. He is best known for playing Chewbacca in the Star Wars movies.All about Peter Mayhew Mayhew was 7 feet 3 inches tall. Mayhew was born in London, England. On 30 April 2019, he died at his home in Boyd, Texas from a heart attack, aged 74. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1944 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:Actors from London
title: Peter Mayhew
